channel.title: My Drop Rates
channel.description: I have an npc that has several drops. I have 8 items at 100, 1 item at 50, 6 items at 2, and 2 items at 1. What would you say my chance of getting one of those items at 2, and what do you think are the chances of getting one of those items at 1? Use percents please. Thank you!

item.title: My Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

rune2h:

I have an npc that has several drops. I have 8 items at 100, 1 item at 50, 6 items at 2, and 2 items at 1. What would you say my chance of getting one of those items at 2, and what do you think are the chances of getting one of those items at 1? Use percents please. Thank you!

I got this off Kryptix … Don’t remember where the URL was but anyhow, I saved it in a text file…

Any drop with weight set to 0 will drop every time (such as Bones).

To work out your drop percentage you need to first of all get all the weights (I’m using yours as an example):

1
50
5
3
4
5
3
12
11

Total Weight: 1 + 50 + 5 + 4 + 5 + 3 + 12 + 11 = 91

Drop Percentage: WEIGHT / TOTAL WEIGHT * 100

So, for example, you’re dropping Rune Kites (item ID 404:

(4 / (1 + 50 + 5 + 4 + 5 + 3 + 12 + 11)) * 100

That means the Rune Kite would drop 22.75% of the time.

It’s 9:15am and I haven’t slept yet so I might have got this wrong. Here’s how it’s calculated on RSCEmulation’s website though:

King Black Dragon drops the following items:

100%: Dragon Bones
0.04%: Dragon Square Shield
0.24%: Dragon Medium Helmet
0.34%: Half Dragon Square Shield
0.34%: Half Dragon Square Shield
0.49%: Cape of Legends
0.74%: Dragon Axe
0.74%: Dragon Sword
1.49%: Large Rune Helmet
1.49%: Rune 2-Handed Sword
1.49%: Rune Plate Mail Body
1.49%: Runite Bar (3)
1.49%: Rune Chain Mail Body
1.49%: Rune Kite Shield
1.49%: Rune Plate Mail Legs
1.99%: Dragon Bone Certificate (5)
1.99%: Gauntlets of Cooking
1.99%: Staff of Iban
1.99%: Coins (50,000)
1.99%: Half of a Key
1.99%: Half of a Key
7.46%: Cabbage (10)
7.46%: Fire-Rune (1,000)
7.46%: Air-Rune (1,000)
7.46%: Nature-Rune (75)
7.46%: Law-Rune (75)
7.46%: Death-Rune (75)
7.46%: Rune Axe
7.46%: Rune Pickaxe
7.46%: Blood-Rune (100)
7.46%: Rune Arrows (50)

Hope this helps, It helped me alot…

Read full topic

Its VERY simple, and to find out how to do it use the search engine. Perhaps change your top post and actually ask for peoples opinions on if the items will be too rare or too common.
